markdown.headingText: Define UI for app that draws a histogram ----
markdown.markdown:
```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 600
library(shiny)
library(bslib)
library(survival)
library(tidyverse)
library(survminer)

data <- readxl::read_xlsx("240508_Survival_project_for_maths_students_opened.xlsx")
data$`Sex (Male 1, Female 2)` <- as.factor(data$`Sex (Male 1, Female 2)`)
data[data == 999.0] <- NA
data <- data %>% filter(Diagnosis_number != 2.5)
data$Diagnosis_number <- as.factor(data$Diagnosis_number)

theme <- bs_theme(font_scale = 1.5)

ui <- page_sidebar(theme = theme,
                   fluidPage(
  selectInput("sex", "Sex", choices = c("Male" = 1, "Female" = 2)),
  numericInput("age", "Age at Diagnosis", value = 50),
  numericInput("duration", "Disease Duration at Diagnosis", value = 1),
  numericInput("ace_total", "ACEIII Total", value = 50),
  selectInput("diagnosis_number", "Diagnosis Number", choices = unique(data$Diagnosis_number)),
  actionButton("submit", "Submit"),
  plotOutput("survivalPlot"),
  tableOutput("dataTable")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  rv <- reactiveValues(df = NULL)

  observeEvent(input$submit, {
    rv$df <- data.frame(
      `Sex (Male 1, Female 2)` = as.integer(input$sex), 
      `Age at diagnosis` = input$age, 
      `Disease duration at diagnosis` = input$duration,
      `ACEIII::ACEIIITotal` = input$ace_total,
      `Diagnosis_number` = as.integer(input$diagnosis_number),
      check.names = FALSE
    )
  })

  rv_model <- reactive({
    req(rv$df)
    filter_data <- data %>% filter(Diagnosis_number == rv$df$`Diagnosis_number`)
    cox_model <- coxph(Surv(`Diagnosis till death`, `Event`) ~ `Age at diagnosis` + `Sex (Male 1, Female 2)` + `Disease duration at diagnosis` + `ACEIII::ACEIIITotal`, data = filter_data, model = TRUE)
    cox_model
  })

  surv_fit <- reactive({
    req(rv_model())
    fit <- survfit(rv_model(), newdata = rv$df[1, , drop = FALSE]) # Ensure newdata is a dataframe
    fit
  })

  output$survivalPlot <- renderPlot({
    req(surv_fit())
    plot(surv_fit(), ylab = "Probability of Survival", xlab = "Time",
         col = c("red", "black", "black"), main = "Survival Curve")
  })

  output$dataTable <- renderTable({
    rv$df
  })
}

# Run the application
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)

```
markdown.srcMarkdownNoYaml:
```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 600
library(shiny)
library(bslib)
library(survival)
library(tidyverse)
library(survminer)

data <- readxl::read_xlsx("240508_Survival_project_for_maths_students_opened.xlsx")
data$`Sex (Male 1, Female 2)` <- as.factor(data$`Sex (Male 1, Female 2)`)
data[data == 999.0] <- NA
data <- data %>% filter(Diagnosis_number != 2.5)
data$Diagnosis_number <- as.factor(data$Diagnosis_number)

theme <- bs_theme(font_scale = 1.5)

# Define UI for app that draws a histogram ----
ui <- page_sidebar(theme = theme,
                   fluidPage(
  selectInput("sex", "Sex", choices = c("Male" = 1, "Female" = 2)),
  numericInput("age", "Age at Diagnosis", value = 50),
  numericInput("duration", "Disease Duration at Diagnosis", value = 1),
  numericInput("ace_total", "ACEIII Total", value = 50),
  selectInput("diagnosis_number", "Diagnosis Number", choices = unique(data$Diagnosis_number)),
  actionButton("submit", "Submit"),
  plotOutput("survivalPlot"),
  tableOutput("dataTable")
)

server <- function(input, output) {
  rv <- reactiveValues(df = NULL)

  observeEvent(input$submit, {
    rv$df <- data.frame(
      `Sex (Male 1, Female 2)` = as.integer(input$sex), 
      `Age at diagnosis` = input$age, 
      `Disease duration at diagnosis` = input$duration,
      `ACEIII::ACEIIITotal` = input$ace_total,
      `Diagnosis_number` = as.integer(input$diagnosis_number),
      check.names = FALSE
    )
  })

  rv_model <- reactive({
    req(rv$df)
    filter_data <- data %>% filter(Diagnosis_number == rv$df$`Diagnosis_number`)
    cox_model <- coxph(Surv(`Diagnosis till death`, `Event`) ~ `Age at diagnosis` + `Sex (Male 1, Female 2)` + `Disease duration at diagnosis` + `ACEIII::ACEIIITotal`, data = filter_data, model = TRUE)
    cox_model
  })

  surv_fit <- reactive({
    req(rv_model())
    fit <- survfit(rv_model(), newdata = rv$df[1, , drop = FALSE]) # Ensure newdata is a dataframe
    fit
  })

  output$survivalPlot <- renderPlot({
    req(surv_fit())
    plot(surv_fit(), ylab = "Probability of Survival", xlab = "Time",
         col = c("red", "black", "black"), main = "Survival Curve")
  })

  output$dataTable <- renderTable({
    rv$df
  })
}

# Run the application
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
